code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import ExperimentContext from"../context/experiment/experimentContext";import TreeContext from"../context/tree/treeContext";var PerformanceControl=function PerformanceControl(){var experimentContext=useContext(ExperimentContext);var treeContext=useContext(TreeContext);var getExperimentPerformanceMetrics=experimentContext.getExperimentPerformanceMetrics,experiment=experimentContext.experiment,loadingPerformance=experimentContext.loadingPerformance;var enabledTreeSearch=treeContext.enabledTreeSearch;var onSubmitRequest=function onSubmitRequest(e){e.preventDefault();getExperimentPerformanceMetrics(experiment.expid);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"card-header p-1"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"row justify-content-end"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"col-md-2"},experiment&&/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:onSubmitRequest,className:"form"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"submit",value:"Refresh",className:"btn btn-success btn-block btn-sm",disabled:!enabledTreeSearch||loadingPerformance})))));};export default PerformanceControl;
